extendedInfo.description: Hong Kong Art Guide is the first app designed for visual art exhibitions for Hong Kong. With us, you can find art exhibitions anytime anywhere you want.It also contains comprehensive up-to-date art news, sure you can know whatâs on in local art society.We encourage everyone to experience art and share their views.We hope to raise public awareness and appreciation towards art in order to build Hong Kong as Asia's art capital.FEATURES:- Collect the most fashionable and inspirational visual art exhibitions- Sorted by the current, the upcoming or the most popular- Provide details of exhibition (eg: date, time, address, profile and video)- With an "add to calendar" button, you can quickly and easily add your favorite exhibition into calendar to remind you when it starts and ends- Connect with map to show you the exhibitions nearby- Users can write reviews to share with other art lovers- Art news including art activities, artist profiles and artwork introduction

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This app delivers up-to-date visual art news including art activities, artist profiles and artworks information for hong kong. It is user friendly and i wont get lost while searching for the most upcoming art news. The connection with a map showing me how to get to the exhibition nearby. It is definitely a nice app for art lovers.
reviews.author: E Lee
